code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:21 YO female taxonomist presents with 3 weeks history of moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. o:Height 174 cm, Weight 65.2 kg, Temperature 37.4 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 77, Respiration 17 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed dexamethasone - 0.4 mL 3-4 drops in both ears 2-3 x per day, and ordered pure tone audiometry.

s:pt presents with moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments x 5 weeks. pt also complains of moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear. she is a 22 yr old white female taxonomist. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 172 cm, Weight 62.5 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed dexamethasone - 0.4 mL 3-4 drops in both ears 2-3 x per day, and ordered pure tone audiometry.
